rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A transitional space with storage and display areas for entrance.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Small guest toilet adjacent to the entry area.

rooms.name: Living Area & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A combined living area and open-plan kitchen with modern finishes. Vastu guidelines ensure the space is oriented towards the east for light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Large master bedroom with an attached private balcony, located in a quiet corner for enhanced privacy and relaxation.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office designed with ergonomic principles and ample natural lighting from south-facing windows, ensuring focus and productivity.

rooms.name: Child Bedrooms
rooms.description: Adjacent twin bedrooms to maximize space efficiency.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom with modern fixtures and ample storage.
